      • CATEGORY

        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_START_UI

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_START_UI
        Activity Action: Start UI
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.START_UI"

        BroadPOS would show status like CardStatus.CARD_REMOVAL_REQUIRED before start any Entry Action. It's hard to choose default ui or customized ui. So we add this action.
        In InsertAnyTime case, if customized app implements this action, BroadPOS will call customized app to foreground.
        Suggestion to prompt a dialog "Processing,Please wait..."
        After dialog show up, sendNext()

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Output: Nothing

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE
        Activity Action: General Confirmation with Message
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE"

        If specific confirmation activity not found in customized app, BroadPOS will try start this general confirmation activity.

        Example:
        If BroadPOS try to start Activity "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_CARD_PRESENT", but your app does not implement it.
        then BroadPOS will try to start this general confirmation Activity "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE".

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_REVERSE_PARTIAL_APPROVAL

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REVERSE_PARTIAL_APPROVAL
        Activity Action: Reverse or Accept a Partial-approval transaction
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.REVERSE_PARTIAL_APPROVAL"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_CURRENCY - is currency type.
        Type: String
        Default value: CurrencyType.USD

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_APPROVED_AMOUNT -
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TOTAL_AMOUNT -
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Approved Amount: %1$s\nDUE: %2$s;Reverse?"
        %1$s is formatted Approved amount, %2$s is formatted due amount (Total Amount- Approved Amount)

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -
        Type: String[]
        Options are PartialApprovalOption.REVERSE and PartialApprovalOption.ACCEPT
        If select , the transaction will be voided.
        If select , the transaction will be accepted with partial-approval.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE
        If select , return FALSE

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_SUPPLEMENT_PARTIAL_APPROVAL

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SUPPLEMENT_PARTIAL_APPROVAL
        Activity Action: Confirm If Start a New Payment when get partial-approval
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.SUPPLEMENT_PARTIAL_APPROVAL"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_CURRENCY - is currency type.
        Type: String
        Default value: CurrencyType.USD

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_APPROVED_AMOUNT -
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TOTAL_AMOUNT -
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Approved Amount: %1$s\nDUE: %2$s;Another Payment?"
        %1$s is formatted Approved amount, %2$s is formatted due amount (Total Amount- Approved Amount)

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -
        Type: String[]
        Options are PartialApprovalOption.ACCEPT and PartialApprovalOption.DECLINE
        If select , a new payment will be started.
        If select , this transaction will be accepted with partial-approval.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE
        If select , return FALSE

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CONFIRM_ONLINE_RETRY_OFFLINE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CONFIRM_ONLINE_RETRY_OFFLINE
        Deprecated. Not used anymore. Retry-Or-Offline feature has been removed from BroadPOS.
        Activity Action: select the transaction online retry or offline
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_ONLINE_RETRY_OFFLINE"

        If not implemented, BroadPOS will try to start action ACTION_CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE

        input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE -
        input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE -
        request: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CHECK_CARD_PRESENT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CHECK_CARD_PRESENT
        Activity Action: Confirm Card Present
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_CARD_PRESENT"

        If not implemented, BroadPOS will try to start action "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Card Present?"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -
        Type: String[]
        Options: ConfirmationType.YES and ConfirmationType.NO

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_SURCHARGE_FEE
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_BYPASS Optional
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE means Bypass is allowable

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -

        Options: ConfirmationType.YES and ConfirmationType.NO

      • ACTION_CONFIRM_PRINTER_STATUS

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CONFIRM_PRINTER_STATUS
        Activity Action: Confirm Printer Status
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_PRINTER_STATUS"

        If not implemented, BroadPOS will try to start action ACTION_CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PRINT_STATUS
        Type: String
        See PrintStatusType

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        if printer status is PrintStatusType.PRINTER_OUT_OF_PAPER,
        display "Printer Out Of Paper, Retry?"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -
        Type: String[]
        Options: ConfirmationType.YES and ConfirmationType.NO

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CONFIRM_DELETE_SF

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CONFIRM_DELETE_SF
        Activity Action: Confirm Delete SF transaction
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_DELETE_SF"

        If not implemented, BroadPOS will try to start action ACTION_CONFIRM_UNIFIED_MESSAGE

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Delete SF Records, Are You Sure?"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_OPTIONS -
        Type: String[]
        Options: ConfirmationType.YES and ConfirmationType.NO

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CONFIRM_RECEIPT_VIEW

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CONFIRM_RECEIPT_VIEW
        Activity Action: Receipt Print Preview
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.CONFIRM_RECEIPT_VIEW"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE - is transaction mode.
        Type: String
        See TransMode for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE - is trans name.
        Type: String
        Example: "CREDIT SALE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_RECEIPT_URI
        Type: String

        Example Code for convert uri to Bitmap: 
                 Uri imageUri = Uri.parse(receiptUri);
         try {
             if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT < Build.VERSION_CODES.Q) {
                 bitmap = MediaStore.Images.Media.getBitmap(this.getContentResolver(), imageUri);
             } else {
                 ImageDecoder.Source source = ImageDecoder.createSource(this.getContentResolver(), imageUri);
                 ImageDecoder.OnHeaderDecodedListener listener = new ImageDecoder.OnHeaderDecodedListener() {
                     @Override
                     public void onHeaderDecoded(@NonNull ImageDecoder decoder, @NonNull ImageDecoder.ImageInfo info, @NonNull ImageDecoder.Source source) {
                         decoder.setAllocator(ImageDecoder.ALLOCATOR_SOFTWARE);
                         decoder.setMutableRequired(true);
                     }
                 };
                 bitmap = ImageDecoder.decodeBitmap(source);
             }

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_CONFIRMED -
        Type: Boolean
        If select , return TRUE.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_DISPLAY_QR_CODE_RECEIPT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DISPLAY_QR_CODE_RECEIPT
        Activity Action: Display QRCode Receipt
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.DISPLAY_QR_CODE_RECEIPT"

        This UI is used to display a QRCode of receipt so that maybe customer could scan it and save to their phone.
        This action request nothing. You can request go to next step like this: 

             Bundle bundle = new Bundle();
     bundle.putStringExtra(EntryRequest.PARAM_ACTION, ConfirmationEntry.ACTION_DISPLAY_QR_CODE_RECEIPT);
     Intent intent = new Intent();
     intent.setPackage(broadPOSPackage); //broadPOSPackage is from EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE
     intent.setAction(EntryRequest.ACTION_NEXT);
     intent.putExtras(bundle);
     context.sendBroadcast(intent);

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_QR_CODE_CONTENT -
        Type: String

        Example Code for convert QRCodeContent to Bitmap:
         private Bitmap createQRCode(public static final String content, int qrCodeSize, Bitmap logo){
         Matrix m = new Matrix();
         int imageWidth = 80;
         int imageHeight = 80;
         m.setScale((float) imageWidth/logo.getWidth(), (float)imageHeight/logo.getHeight());
         logo = Bitmap.createBitmap(logo, 0, 0,
                 logo.getWidth(), logo.getHeight(), m, false);
         MultiFormatWriter writer = new MultiFormatWriter();
         Hashtable<EncodeHintType, Object> hst = new Hashtable<>();
         hst.put(EncodeHintType.CHARACTER_SET, "UTF-8");
         BitMatrix matrix = null;
         try {
             matrix = writer.encode(content, BarcodeFormat.QR_CODE, qrCodeSize, qrCodeSize, hst);
         } catch (Exception e) {
             Logger.e(e);
             return null;
         }
         int width = matrix.getWidth();
         int height = matrix.getHeight();
         int halfW = width / 2;
         int halfH = height / 2;
         int[] pixels = new int[width * height];

         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
                 if (x > halfW - imageWidth/2 && x < halfW + imageWidth/2
                         && y > halfH - imageHeight/2 && y < halfH + imageHeight/2) {
                     pixels[y * width + x] = logo.getPixel(x - halfW
                             + imageWidth/2, y - halfH + imageHeight/2);
                 } else {
                     if (matrix.get(x, y)) {
                         pixels[y * width + x] = 0xff000000;
                     }
                 }

             }
         }
         logo.recycle();
         Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
         bitmap.setPixels(pixels, 0, width, 0, 0, width, height);
         return bitmap;
     }

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT - is timeout.
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 20000.

        Output: Nothing

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
